function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unknown relationship between green spaces and SARS-CoV-2 infection rates","Impact":"Misguided allocation of resources for green space creation and management","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to establish a clearer relationship, invest in diverse green spaces, and consider other factors influencing infection rates","Technologies":"Data analytics, spatial analysis tools, and interdisciplinary research methods","People":"Public health officials, urban planners, and environmental researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inconclusive findings from existing studies","Impact":"Lack of reliable guidance on the role of green spaces in mitigating SARS-CoV-2 infection","Mitigation":"Leverage multiple studies, data sources, and expert opinions to form a comprehensive understanding","Technologies":"Data integration platforms, expert consultations, and meta-analysis tools","People":"Public health authorities, epidemiologists, and environmental scientists","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, and academic consortia"},{"Description":"Short study periods and exclusion of confounding factors","Impact":"Limited understanding of the full impact of green spaces on SARS-CoV-2 infection rates","Mitigation":"Conduct long-term studies, incorporate confounding variables, and employ advanced statistical modeling","Technologies":"Longitudinal data analysis tools, confounding variable adjustment methods, and statistical modeling software","People":"Epidemiologists, statisticians, and environmental researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, and academic consortia"}]}
